headline: Co-founder, Metafi (YC S22)
summary:
On a lifelong mission to inspire our generation of entrepreneurs to solve only the world’s most challenging problems that nobody else dares to solve, if not for ourselves. These are problems that typically sit on the unique crossroads between deeply-entrenched social issues and breakthroughs in technological innovation. 

Only when we solve these problems can the world truly become a better place.

experiences.title: CEO
experiences.description:
Empowering couples' relationships.

Over 50% of long-term, serious relationships end in failure. This is the root to many major social issues we see today - juvenile delinquency, single-parent homes, broken families, depression, etc.

Our vision is to empower every serious relationship to become a couple that's forever in love, inspiring a world where broken families and unhappy children cease to exist. We will materialize this for the next generation of young couples (over 1B of them) and in doing so mitigate some of the world's most major social problems in both developing and developed societies today.

We are always looking for highly capable individuals who equally passionate for our vision, and are hungry enough to make it a reality. DM or email me at raimieft@gmail.com.

More information:
dateideas website: https://www.dateideas.io
dateideas Telegram channel: t.me/dateideas

experiences.title: Junior Account Executive
experiences.description:
I was an intern for Dynamo Communications based in the Silicon Valley under the NUS Overseas Colleges Program. I was fortunate enough to be promoted to a Junior Account Executive during my time there. More importantly, I'm extremely honored to have been part of the awesome Dynamo team which has done amazing work for its clients thus far. 

Dynamo PR was founded out of a desire to create an agency that can generate new ideas; an agency that can translate those ideas into effective, exciting communications campaigns; and an agency that delivers campaigns designed to drive customers’ business objectives whether that is through raising funds, targeted social media and adspend, or traditional PR.

Based in San Francisco, California, we have a creative, vibrant team that focus on tech, mobile, startup, consumer, crowdfunding, and digital clients, all while delivering 360 degree service.

We like to do things differently, delivering award winning creative campaigns for our clients, offering services outside of traditional PR (reseller/distributer work, product development, branding and messaging, VC training, etc.), and simply being the best at giving the media what they want, when they want.

education.field_of_study: Chemical Engineering (Hons) and Business Administration (Hons) (Top 1% of cohort)
education.degree_name: Double Degree Programme (Double Honours): B.Eng & BBA
education.description: Widened my horizons with 10+ overseas competitions and programmes (Silicon Valley, Croatia, Middle East, China, India, Southeast Asia, etc.) during my undergraduate candidature.Conceptualized and organized a Singapore Record-breaking event, involving over 500 students and professors to make it a success. My name is on the Singapore National Book of Records!NUS Overseas Colleges ScholarNUS Eusoff Hall ScholarDouble Degree Programme GraduateBizad Leadership Development Programme GraduateEusoff Hall Awareness Board PresidentEusoff Hall Sponsorships and Marketing DirectorEusoff Hall Table Tennis CaptainChemical Engineering Students' Society Vice-Publicity Director

Took Entrepreneurship at Stanford University as part of the NUS Overseas Colleges Programme. Competed in 27 Hackathons across the Bay Area, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, etc. during weekends, and won prizes for 20 of them.Joined the following clubs: Business Association of Stanford Entrepreneurial Students (BASES), ASES, Table Tennis, Drone Club.
